Tasks.Task Description: Identify the volume of data to be transferred, the source and destination locations, and the timeline for the transfer. Determine if Azure Data Box is the appropriate solution based on these requirements.
Order the Azure Data Box device through the Azure portal, specifying the required storage capacity and delivery details.
Ensure the data to be transferred is organized and ready for migration. Verify that the data complies with Azure Data Box requirements, such as file formats and size limitations.
Set up the destination Azure Storage account where the data will be uploaded. Configure access permissions and security settings for the account.

Tasks.Task: Receive and Set Up Azure Data Box
Tasks.Task Description: Unpack and set up the Azure Data Box device upon delivery. Connect it to the local network and ensure it is powered on and operational.

Tasks.Task: Transfer Data to Azure Data Box
Tasks.Task Description: Copy the prepared data from the source location to the Azure Data Box device using the recommended tools and methods.

Tasks.Task: Secure Azure Data Box for Shipment
Tasks.Task Description: Ensure the Azure Data Box device is securely packed and ready for shipment back to the Azure data center. Follow the provided instructions for packaging and labeling.
Monitor the shipment of the Azure Data Box device to the Azure data center using the tracking information provided.
Confirm that the data has been successfully uploaded to the Azure Storage account. Validate the integrity and completeness of the transferred data.
Ensure that the data in the Azure Storage account is encrypted and access controls are properly configured. Apply additional security measures as needed.
Create detailed documentation of the data transfer process, including configurations, issues encountered, and resolutions. Share the documentation with relevant stakeholders.
Set up monitoring for the Azure Storage account to track usage, performance, and potential issues. Configure alerts for unusual activity or capacity thresholds.
Perform an audit to ensure compliance with organizational and regulatory requirements. Verify that the data transfer process adhered to security and operational standards.
